revised_title: A Case Study of a Man with a Strange Imitating Nature and Unusual Calculi
tldr: This article describes a man named Donald Monro who has a unique ability to involuntarily imitate the gestures and actions of those around him. The author, George Garden, also discusses the case of a woman who passed four large calculi, which are stone-like formations in the urinary system. The article raises questions about the possible causes of Monro's behavior and its connection to his early life experiences.
